select * from users

select * from content join board using(content_no) join menu using(menu_no) join users using(user_no) where board_type = 1
and menu_no = #{menuNo}
and (content_title like '%${search}%' or content_detail like '%${search}%')
order by content_no desc

select c.content_no, c.content_title, c.create_date, c.modify_date, c.content_status, c.delete_status, c.user_no, c.md_recommendation, m.menu_name, LISTAGG(cat.category_name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cat.category_name) AS category_name from content c left join content_category cc on c.content_no = cc.content_no left join category cat on cc.category_no = cat.category_no left join menu m on cat.menu_no = m.menu_no where not exists ( select 1 FROM board b where c.content_no = b.content_no )
and cat.menu_no = #{menuNo}
and (c.content_title like '%${search}%' or c.content_detail like '%${search}%')
group by c.content_no, c.content_title, c.create_date, c.modify_date, c.content_status, c.delete_status, c.user_no, c.md_recommendation, m.menu_name order by c.content_no desc
